alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 12:43AM CST until January 01 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... Central Yell County in central Arkansas... South central Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 130 AM CST. * At 1242 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Danville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Danville... Atkins... Ola... Adona... Carden Bottoms... Fourche Valley... Petit Jean State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Belleville... Casa... Corinth... Birta... Ada... Nimrod... Wing... Holla Bend... Kingston... Rover... This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
